thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Minesh Kumar
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Minesh Kumar

author: Minesh Kumar
title: Minesh Kumar
text: Everything with the car rented was really great. Great value as well but one of the staff member was not very nice. None of the staff had any smiles on their face. On return of the car I was told to have the keys in the ignition, as we have a specials need child , some urgent attention was needed with her. In the meantime I was told very rudely "I told you to have the key in the ignition". I went to return the car with the thought that I would tell them of what a great time we had with the rental but sadly that did not happen.
